import*as ReactDOM from'react-dom';export function getCookie(cname){var name=cname+"=";var decodedCookie=decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);var ca=decodedCookie.split(';');for(var i=0;i<ca.length;i++){var c=ca[i];while(c.charAt(0)==' '){c=c.substring(1);}if(c.indexOf(name)==0){return c.substring(name.length,c.length);}}return"";};export function scrollToBottom(){var chatDiv=document.getElementsByClassName("all-messages");console.log("chatDiv",chatDiv);chatDiv[0].scrollTop=chatDiv[0].scrollHeight;// chatDiv[0].scrollIntoView(true)
console.log("helloooo");};
